mapper.sql: FROM tbl_action action INNER JOIN tbl_role_action roleAction ON action.id=roleAction.action_id INNER JOIN tbl_role role ON roleAction.role_id=role.id

SELECT action.id AS actionId, action.page, action.action_name AS actionName, action.display_name, action.url, action.action_type, action.description AS actionDescription, role.id AS roleId, role.name AS roleName, role.description AS roleDescription

where.if: AND (action.page LIKE '%${word}%' OR action.action_name LIKE '%${word}%' OR action.display_name LIKE '%${word}%' OR action.url LIKE '%${word}%' OR action.description LIKE '%${word}%')

if.test: offset != null and limit !=null and offset > -1 and limit > 0

select.if: OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{limit} ROWS ONLY;

mapper.select:
select action.page
GROUP BY action.page ORDER BY action.page DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_action( page, action_name, display_name, url, action_type, description, record_reg_id, record_upd_id, record_reg_date, record_upd_date ) values ( #{page}, #{actionName}, #{displayName}, #{url}, #{actionType}, #{description}, #{recordRegId}, #{recordUpdId}, #{recordRegDate}, #{recordUpdDate} )
